features.description: Web scraping module to search for NFL MVP voter information across multiple sources
Reddit API integration to search for posts/comments about MVP voters and their picks
Google News/web search integration to find articles mentioning voter selections
Database schema to store voter information (name, affiliation, outlet, social media handles)
Database schema to store publicly announced votes (voter_id, candidate, ranking, source URL, date)
Automated web crawler to periodically search for new voter announcements
URL deduplication and source tracking to avoid counting same announcement multiple times
Natural language processing to extract voter names and their MVP picks from text
Confidence scoring system for extracted information (high/medium/low confidence)
Manual entry interface for adding known voters and their votes
Dashboard showing list of all 50 AP voters (known and unknown)
Voter detail page showing their vote breakdown and source links
Summary statistics page (total voters found, votes disclosed, votes per candidate)
Search and filter functionality to find voters by name, outlet, or candidate voted for
Export functionality to download data as CSV/JSON
Source credibility tracking (official announcement vs speculation)
Historical voter database from previous years for reference
Notification system to alert when new voter information is found
API endpoints to query voter data programmatically
Rate limiting and caching for web scraping to avoid being blocked
Admin interface to verify/edit/approve automatically extracted information
Visualization showing vote distribution across candidates
Timeline view showing when votes were publicly announced
Integration with news aggregators to find recent MVP-related articles
Comprehensive logging system for all scraping and extraction activities
Initial research script to gather known voters from current season
Seed database with confirmed voters (Tom Brady, Mina Kimes, etc.)
Documentation on how to add new data sources and extend the scraper
Unit tests for NLP extraction and data validation
Responsive web UI that works on mobile and desktop
